Title: The Future Is Woman
Writer: Marco Ferreri (story and screenplay), Dacia Maraini (story and screenplay), Piera Degli Esposti (story and screenplay)
Actors: Ornella Muti, Hanna Schygulla, Niels Arestrup, Maurizio Donadoni
Plot: The story about a couple who do not want to have children of their own, and a pregnant, single woman who needs a home for a while, the relationship between the three protagonists is strange, at the very least.
